channel.title: Random CTDS
channel.description: I have to report some random CTDS. I was doing nothing special. Just playing. Maps where Subtransit, Undertow and Gasworks. Only one of the crashes generated a Event Log in the even viewer. But none generated a dump file. Here is the crash log. [code]Fault bucket 1157362834, type 17 Event Name: APPCRASH Response: Not available Cab Id: 0 Problem signature: P1: bms.exe P2: 0.0.0.0 P3: 5547ecfa P4: studiorender.dll P5: 0.0.0.0 P6: 5547ed8f P7: c0000005 P8: 00009bc1 P9: Faulting application name: bms.exe, version: 0.0.0.0, time stamp: 0x5547ecfa Faulting module name: studiorender.dll, version: 0.0.0.0, time stamp: 0x5547ed8f Exception code: 0xc0000005 Fault offset: 0x00009bc1 Faulting process id: 0xd3c Faulting application start time: 0x01d08797bf1496a4 Faulting application path: F:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Black Mesa\bms.exe Faulting module path: f:\program files (x86)\steam\steamapps\common\black mesa\bin\studiorender.dll Report Id: f3047e87-f38d-11e4-bd4c-902b3436621d[/code] I have attached the WER (Windows Error Report file) renamed to TXT for reading. My PC [b]Motherboard: Gigabyte Z77X-UD3H[/b] [b]Memory: 8 GB - G.Skill Sniper 1866mhz[/b] [b]CPU: Intel Core i7 3770@4.4GHz with Corsair H60 2013 [/b] [b]GPU: AMD Radeon HD 7970 (SAPPHIRE OC with Boost Edition) [/b] [b]SPU: Creative Sound Blaster X-FI Titanium HD[/b] Report.TXT (21.1 KB)

item.title: Random CTDS
item.dc:creator: SkyNET
item.description:
I have to report some random CTDS.

I was doing nothing special. Just playing.
Maps where Subtransit, Undertow and Gasworks.

Only one of the crashes generated a Event Log in the even viewer.
But none generated a dump file.

Here is the crash log.

Fault bucket 1157362834, type 17 Event Name: APPCRASH Response: Not available Cab Id: 0 Problem signature: P1: bms.exe P2: 0.0.0.0 P3: 5547ecfa P4: studiorender.dll P5: 0.0.0.0 P6: 5547ed8f P7: c0000005 P8: 00009bc1 P9: Faulting application name: bms.exe, version: 0.0.0.0, time stamp: 0x5547ecfa Faulting module name: studiorender.dll, version: 0.0.0.0, time stamp: 0x5547ed8f Exception code: 0xc0000005 Fault offset: 0x00009bc1 Faulting process id: 0xd3c Faulting application start time: 0x01d08797bf1496a4 Faulting application path: F:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Black Mesa\bms.exe Faulting module path: f:\program files (x86)\steam\steamapps\common\black mesa\bin\studiorender.dll Report Id: f3047e87-f38d-11e4-bd4c-902b3436621d

I have attached the WER (Windows Error Report file) renamed to TXT for reading.

My PC

Motherboard: Gigabyte Z77X-UD3H
Memory: 8 GB - G.Skill Sniper 1866mhz
CPU: Intel Core i7 3770@4.4GHz with Corsair H60 2013
GPU: AMD Radeon HD 7970 (SAPPHIRE OC with Boost Edition)
SPU: Creative Sound Blaster X-FI Titanium HD
Report.TXT (21.1 KB)

Read full topic
